name: Pair of Torchères
maker: Pieter de Swart, probably carved by Agostino Carlini
description: Pair of Torchères; Pieter de Swart (Dutch, 1702 - 1772), probably carved by Agostino Carlini (Italian, about 1718 - 1790); The Hague (possibly), Netherlands; about 1748 - 1753; Gessoed, painted, and gilt limewood; crushed glass; bases possibly of dogwood; 79.DA.5; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Pair of Torchères
medium: Gessoed, painted, and gilt limewood; crushed glass; bases possibly of dogwood
